peril.io

Class MapWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.io.MapWriter

  • public final class MapWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Writes the current state of the game into a text file so that it can be loaded at a later time.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.07
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameController game
      The GameController that this MapWriter uses to interact with the game.
      private TextFileWriter writer
      The TextFileWriter that creates the save file.
